data.name: plFieldEnable_Quote.Help
data.value:
Module has some built-in fields for video informations. Like "Quote/Author/Image/Source/Summary/LinkUrl/Detail". You can control whether to use them for each deparment. For example, if you uncheck "Enable Author Field" option for current gallery, then when post videos which belong to this deparment, the "Author" field will be hidden.
Use this feature to hidden unwanted fields as your wish.

data.name: plDetailPage.Help
data.value: Select which page to dispaly video/audio detail which belong to this gallery. You should put a CrossVideo_Detail sub module instance on that page and select its gallery to this item. Note, module will automatic fill this value when you put CrossVideo_Detail module instance on page first time.

data.name: plImage.Help
data.value: Specify a image for this gallery (optional)

data.name: plListPage.Help
data.value: Select which page to dispaly media list which belong to this gallery when user search media or click media category. You should put a CrossVideo_List sub module instance on that page and select its gallery to this item. Note, module will automatic fill this value when you put CrossVideo_List module instance on page first time.

data.name: plEnableField.Help
data.value:
Specifications are detail description of videos which belong to this gallery. Module has a built-in fields,like "Video Detail" for all galleries.
Besides that, module also support up 5 additional specification fields which you can customize. You can enable them and specify their title and default value.
For example, if you publish information related notebook, besides "Video detail", you may want add "Technical Details" specification for it.
Note, use these specification fields for long content (html or text based). If you want to customize short specific content, use "Attributes" feature in CrossVideo_Admin module instead.

data.name: plFieldDefault.Help
data.value: Default value for this specification. User can modify it to fit his videos/audios

data.name: plFieldTitle.Help
data.value: Enter title for this specification, like "Technical Details"

data.name: plFieldEnable_Description.Help
data.value:
Module has some built-in fields for video informations. Like "Quote/Author/Image/Source/Summary/LinkUrl/Detail". You can control whether to use them for each deparment. For example, if you uncheck "Enable Author Field" option for current gallery, then when post videos which belong to this deparment, the "Author" field will be hidden.
Use this feature to hidden unwanted fields as your wish.

data.name: Tip_FieldEnable.Text
data.value: Module has some built-in fields for video/audio informations. Like "Quote/Author/Image/Source/Summary/LinkUrl/Detail.......". You can control whether to use them for each gallery. For example, if you uncheck "Enable Author Field" option for current gallery, then when post media which belong to this gallery, the "Author" field will be hidden. It also will be hidden when display in CrossVideo_List and CrossVideo_Detail module.

data.name: plMediaType.Help
data.value:
Select media type which gallery belong. If you select it as "Video", then user can only post videos (flv/mp4/webm video files, or YouTube url/ RTMP stream) to this gallery. If you select it as "Audio", then user can only post audios (mp3/aac/ogg file) to this gallery. Note, this value can't be changed after updated.

Normally you need create 2 galleries (one "Media Type" property is "Video", the other "Media Type" is "Audio") to post both videos and audios on your site.

data.name: Tip_MediaType.Text
data.value:
Select media type which gallery belongs. If you select it as "Video", then user can only post video (flv/mp4/webm video files, or YouTube url/ RTMP stream) to this gallery. If you select it as "Audio", then user can only post audio (aac, m4a, f4a,mp3, ogg, oga files) to this gallery. Note, this value can't be changed after updated.

  Normally you need create 2 galleries (one "Media Type" property is "Video", the other "Media Type" is "Audio") to post both videos and audios on your site.

data.name: lblFieldDefault.Text
data.value: Default value for this specification, author can modify it to fit his videos/audios while edit them.

data.name: Tip_DetailPage.Text
data.value:
Select which page to dispaly media detail which belong to this gallery. You should put a CrossVideo_Detail sub module instance on that page and select its gallery to this item.

   Note, module will automatic fill this value when you put CrossVideo_Detaill module instance on page first time. You can also click "Run detail page setting wizards" button to configure it at any time.

   This setting is also vital to integrate with dnn built-in search mechanism. If you can't search your videos/audios with dnn built-in search, please check this setting.

data.name: Tip_ExtendField.Text
data.value:
Specifications are detail description of media which belongs to this gallery. Module already has a built-in fields: "Detail" for all galleries.

  Besides that, module also supports up 5 additional specification fields which you can customize. You can enable them and specify their title and default value.

   For example, if you publish information related notebook, besides "Video detail", you may also want add "Technical Detail" specification for it. To do it, you can check on "Enable" option for "Specification 1", input "Technical Detail" as its title. Then author will see a "Technical Detail" field while edit videos (audios) which belong to current gallery. You can also specify "default value" for it so author can simply modify this default value while edit his media.

  Note, use these specification fields for long content (html based) only. If you want to customize short specific content, use "Attributes" feature in CrossVideo_Admin module instead.

data.name: Tip_ListPage.Text
data.value:
Select which page to dispaly media which belong to this gallery when user search media or click media category. You should put a CrossVideo_List sub module instance on that page and select its gallery to this item.

  Note, module will automatic fill this value when you put CrossVideo_List module instance on page first time.

data.name: plAllowGoogleMap.Help
data.value: Check this option to integrate with Google Maps. Media belongs to this gallery can provide its longitude and latitude and show in Google Maps.

data.name: Tip_AllowGoogleMap.Text
data.value: Check this option to integrate with Google Maps. Media which belongs to this gallery can provide its longitude/latitude and show in Google Maps. This is useful when you publish map related videos/audios (e.g, park, city, hotel...etc).
